availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Dover, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy J. Parker Mitchell. Father of William Ignatius, Casinora, Martha A., Carrie E., Sue, Mollie, Dion, and Mildred A Mitchell. Mason County, Kentucky resident in 1850. Farmer in Dover, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason, District 1, p. 25A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason, Dover, 233.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason, Dover, 308B.
